name: Chill Drive
description:
Introduction

Make a plan you want to focus on, and then start a comfortable and undisturbed time.


Music is always helpful to improve efficiency, Chill Drive has multiple relaxing music to help you focus on your plans in a comfortable atmosphere. In addition, custom music lists also support importing local music you like.

Tomato clock supports custom focus time and break time, switch between multiple styles of backgrounds and different environments white noise. Through various settings options, you can design suitable arrangements and environmental atmosphere.

In the calendar, you can view records of daily completion plans, as well as statistics of total time and completion quantities. NO STEPS, NO MILES. In Chill Drive, you can review every step of the past.

Features

  • Tomato clock
    Customizable tomato clock function, set a goal and complete it!
  • Relaxing music
    20 relaxing music tracks and support for importing local music
  • Dynamic background
    Multiple styles of dynamic backgrounds, for entering an immersive state of focus
  • Environmental white noise
    Choose white noise suitable for your focused atmosphere, shut out external "noise"
  • Calendar and Statistics
    Record each goal you have completed, and count the cumulative number and time of tasks completed
